testcase.title: Verifying the filter section with default filter options

the page "Home" should be loaded on log on

I enter the text "mouth disease" in search bar in 'Sites and Investigator' Page

substeps.message: Look up pop up  isenabled in sites and investigator page

I select "List view" on 'Sites & Investigators' Page
